steps.title: Make an outline for the head and the body of the eagle.
steps.content: Make an outline for the head and the body of the eagle. Draw a circle for the head, an upright quadrilateral for the neck and a big oblong for the body. As for the beak, attach a smaller quadrilateral on the head and a slanted triangle.

steps.title: Draw an outline of a branch below the oblong.
steps.content: Draw an outline of a branch below the oblong.

steps.title: Attach two smaller oblongs on the branch.
steps.content: Attach two smaller oblongs on the branch. They will serve as the eagle’s feet. Add a rectangle below the body to make the tail.

steps.title: Draw details on the head, like the eyes and feathers.
steps.content: Draw details on the head, like the eyes and feathers.

steps.title: Sketch the wings on the body of the eagle delicately.
steps.content: Sketch the wings on the body of the eagle delicately. If you really want to make it fancy, draw down feathers, secondary feathers, and primary feathers.

steps.title: Add talons to the eagle’s feet.
steps.content: Add talons to the eagle’s feet.

steps.title: Draw feathers on the tail.
steps.content: Draw feathers on the tail.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines and color as desired.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines and color as desired.

steps.title: Draw the body of the eagle.
steps.content: Draw the body of the eagle. Make a small circle for the head and attach an oblong to the circle to serve as the body. Insert a pentagon in between the two shapes. Add a small quadrilateral and a little triangle to the head to represent the beak.

steps.title: Draw two slanted shapes on each side of the body for the wings.
steps.content: Draw two slanted shapes on each side of the body for the wings.

steps.title: Add more detailed shapes on each of the wings to make them more elaborate.
steps.content: Add more detailed shapes on each of the wings to make them more elaborate.

steps.title: Draw three quadrilaterals, one slightly bigger than the other two.
steps.content: Draw three quadrilaterals, one slightly bigger than the other two. Add two small circles for the feet.

steps.title: Add details to the head, like eyes and feathers.
steps.content: Add details to the head, like eyes and feathers. The feathers can be outlined using zigzag lines.

steps.title: Add details to the wings.
steps.content: Add details to the wings. This time make softer curved lines instead of zigzag lines for the feathers.

steps.title: Add more feathers to the wings.
steps.content: Add more feathers to the wings.

steps.title: Sketch feathers to the body and tail.
steps.content: Sketch feathers to the body and tail.

steps.title: Add claws to the feet.
steps.content: Add claws to the feet.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines and colour as desired.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines and colour as desired.

steps.title: Draw a circle-oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle-oval for the head.

steps.title: Draw an inverted triangle and a small circle beside it for the beak.
steps.content: Draw an inverted triangle and a small circle beside it for the beak. Then, add an oval-shaped body.

steps.title: Draw a large oval with the top wider than the bottom for the body.
steps.content: Draw a large oval with the top wider than the bottom for the body. Then, draw two small ovals below it for the legs.

steps.title: Draw two curves connecting the head to the body.
steps.content: Draw two curves connecting the head to the body.

steps.title: Draw a triangle for the right wing and a large trapezoid for the left wing.
steps.content: Draw a triangle for the right wing and a large trapezoid for the left wing.

steps.title: Draw a series of ovals for the feet.
steps.content: Draw a series of ovals for the feet. Add pointed lines in the edges of the ovals to make the claws.

steps.title: Draw an irregular diamond below the body for the tail.
steps.content: Draw an irregular diamond below the body for the tail.

steps.title: Based on the outlines, draw the head and beak along with the eyes.
steps.content: Based on the outlines, draw the head and beak along with the eyes. Make pointed curves below the head to complete it.

steps.title: Complete the body and feet based from the outlines, darken necessary outlines and draw details.
steps.content: Complete the body and feet based from the outlines, darken necessary outlines and draw details.

steps.title: Complete the wings and tail based on the outline.
steps.content: Complete the wings and tail based on the outline. Draw curves inside and on the edges of the wings and tail to simulate the feathers.

steps.title: Delete the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Delete the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your eagle!
steps.content: Color your eagle!

steps.title: Draw an oval to outline the body.
steps.content: Draw an oval to outline the body.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head and draw two curves connecting the head and body.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head and draw two curves connecting the head and body.

steps.title: Draw an irregular rectangle in the right side of the head.
steps.content: Draw an irregular rectangle in the right side of the head.

steps.title: Draw a two ovals for the legs and two circles for the feet.
steps.content: Draw a two ovals for the legs and two circles for the feet.

steps.title: Draw two lines above the body for the wing outline and a trapezoid on the left part for the tail.
steps.content: Draw two lines above the body for the wing outline and a trapezoid on the left part for the tail.

steps.title: Complete the wing outline by drawing curves from the edge of the wings connecting to the body.
steps.content: Complete the wing outline by drawing curves from the edge of the wings connecting to the body.

steps.title: Complete the head, body, and feet based on the outlines, darken the necessary outlines and draw the details.
steps.content: Complete the head, body, and feet based on the outlines, darken the necessary outlines and draw the details.

steps.title: Complete the wings and tail based on the outlines.
steps.content: Complete the wings and tail based on the outlines. Draw sharp curves in the edges to simulate the feathers.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Draw additional details.
steps.content: Draw additional details.

steps.title: Color your eagle.
steps.content: Color your eagle.
